import React from 'react' import addias from '../assets/images/adidas_yeezy.png' import nike from '../assets/images/nike_air_jordan.png' import other_top from '../assets/images/other_top_brands.png' import google_play from '../assets/images/google_play.svg' import apple_store from '../assets/images/apple_store.svg' import mobile_img from '../assets/images/mobile.png' import one from '../assets/images/one.png' import two from '../assets/images/two.png' import three from '../assets/images/three.png' const Home = () => { return ( <> {/* snakers-today start here */}

{/* your-phone End here */} {/* how it work start here */}

How It Works

AUTHENTICATE

Copy a URL (address) on a desktop or laptop

Highlight the address by moving your mouse cursor over the address bar, click the left mouse button once or press the F6 keyboard shortcut. Right click and choose copy from the drop-down menu.

Authenticate

Do you struggle with sneaker authentication? Submit to us a link or photos of actual sneakers from any websites or apps for authentication and get results in 24 hours or less.

{/* how it work End here */} ) } export default Home
